comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: for me Black Friday is a farce - as most companies spend 5-6 months slowly increasing prices prior to Black Friday so they can suddenly offer items at a "huge discount" when in fact they are just going back to the regular prices of a few months back. While that may not hold for all, it is true for quite a few. The CryptoCloaks one is a genuine one - we did not ramp up prices just to discount
